name: biomni-query-paleobiology
title: Biomni: Query Paleobiology
description: Query the Paleobiology Database for fossil occurrence data spanning Earth's history.
content:
Overview

Searches the Paleobiology Database, a comprehensive resource of fossil occurrences spanning the Phanerozoic, enabling studies of macroevolution, extinction, and biogeography across geological time.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query
  • endpoint (string, optional): PBDB endpoint
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable logging

Input Format

Create JSON:

{
  "prompt": "Find Jurassic dinosaur fossils"
}

Biological Use Case

Essential for paleontology and macroevolution research. Researchers use PBDB to analyze extinction events, study fossil distributions, track evolutionary trends, understand paleobiogeography, reconstruct ancient ecosystems, and investigate climate-biota interactions.

Output

Returns JSON (paleobiology_results.json) with fossil records, taxonomic classifications, coordinates, geological periods, stratigraphic context, collection info, and literature references.

Category

database
